amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for defense environmental cleanup by $20 million and reduces funding for inertial confinement fusion ignition and high yield campaign by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Hastings (WA).
